explanation: [0-0] On a sunny mountain road, a woman in a green top and long skirt squats in front of a red portable gas stove. Pots, bowls, and seasonings are scattered around her. She places her right hand on a flatbread, holds ingredients in her left hand, and smiles while looking ahead. A white van is parked on the road in the background, and a car with its trunk open is parked on the right side of the frame.

[0-2] As a white van parked on the road drives forward, the woman in the green top and long skirt skillfully flips the flatbread in front of her with her right hand, ensuring that both sides are golden and crispy.

[2-9] The woman in the green top and long skirt then places the cooked flatbread into a pot on the left side of the frame. She then places the dough in her left hand onto the red portable gas stove. Afterward, she grabs a lump of dough from the metal pot at her feet and kneads it into a ball.
